directions.dialogText: In this activity, we will practice debugging. Find the mistakes in the code panel then fix them to get the squirrel to the acorn.

levels.mission: Debug the code: Find all the mistakes in the code panel and fix them to get the squirrel to the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`right()\`- face right

\`left()\`- face left

\`up()\`- face up

\`down()\`- face down

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Look for misspellings, missing \`()\`, missing or incorrect parameters, uncapitalized words etc.

workspace.codeSpace:
move()
up()
move()
right()
move()
getAcorn()

quiz.text: Which one of the following choices would call a \`fly\` function?
Which code below will make the squirrel get the acorn?
Which of the following could NOT be a function name?
In \`jump(3);\`, which part is the parameter?

workspace.codeSpace:
move()
getAcorn()
up(2)
getAcorn()
move(2)
getacorn()
right
move(3)
getAcorn()
move(2)
getAcorn()
move(2)
getacorn()
right
move(2)
up
